title: Machine Learning with Python
about: Covers regression, classification, clustering, pipelines, model evaluation, and dimensionality reduction using Python and scikit-learn.

topics.name: Regression
topics.details: Simple and multiple linear regression, model evaluation, and prediction.

topics.name: Classification
topics.details: Logistic regression, decision trees, random forests, and XGBoost for classification tasks.

topics.name: Clustering
topics.details: K-Means clustering for unsupervised learning and customer segmentation.

topics.name: Dimensionality Reduction
topics.details: Principal Component Analysis (PCA) for reducing feature space.

topics.name: Pipelines & Model Selection
topics.details: Building ML pipelines and using GridSearchCV for hyperparameter tuning.

summary: This module provides a comprehensive introduction to machine learning using Python, covering both supervised and unsupervised learning techniques, model evaluation, and practical implementation with real datasets.
